sentences.sContent: Our research has only recently begun to yield important results.
sentences.sCn: 直到最近我们的研究才开始取得重要成果。

sentences.sContent: ...It also gives schools a higher yield rate...
...Scientists are hopeful that Groo Chavie will yield new information about the art and lifestyle of Cro-Magnoon people...
...changed the potential yield of Mexican wheat dramatically...
...Better irrigation can dramatically improve crop yield and about 40% of the world's food supply is currently derived from irrigated land...
...increasing their yield of fruits and vegetables...
...Does being an out-of-state student at the University of Colorado at Boulder yield twice the amount of income as being an in-state student $17...
